inputs.name: Search for known bugs
inputs.help_text: Enter keywords to search for known bugs in the system.

inputs.name: Download latest software
inputs.help_text: Click to download the latest versions of software and review release notes.

actions.description: Submit a ticket to the Pulse Secure Global Support Center (PSGSC) for technical assistance.
Navigate to the technical publications portal to find product documentation.

constraints.description: Certain commands require specific parameters enclosed in curly brackets separated by vertical bars.
Passwords and other sensitive inputs are enclosed in angle brackets.

errors.description: An Attention statement alerts users when traffic might be interrupted or the device might reboot.
A Caution statement alerts users to situations that can be potentially hazardous or cause damage to hardware, firmware, software, or data.

steps: Step 2: Select the desired feature (e.g., Search for known bugs, Download software).
Step 3: Follow on-screen instructions to complete the action.
